main event: A housewife and two marines observed a white, glowing light at the Brooklyn Navy Yard.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a basketball.,The light traveled with a jerky, erratic motion.,The estimated speed of the object was one hundred and seventy miles/hour.,The observation lasted approximately 1 and a quarter minutes.,The sighting involved both civilian and military witnesses.
location: Brooklyn Navy Yard, New York, USA
